website_summaries.verdict: A kid-friendly camera with plenty of options to keep young photographers entertained. Available in either pink or blue.
pros: The camera is easy to grip and use thanks to intuitive controls
Easy enough for kids as young as 3
Durable construction means the camera can survive being dropped
An audible shutter sound makes taking pictures fun
There's also an auto shut-off feature to conserve battery power
cons: Photos are low quality and there's no flash, though kids don't seem to mind

customer_reviews.title: Nearly everything about these cameras is perfect. They're nearly indestructible
customer_reviews.text: Nearly everything about these cameras is perfect. They're nearly indestructible, take lots of great photos, and give young kids a meaningful access to technology. Two complaints: While the cameras themselves are virtually indestructible, the battery cover plates on the sides tend to pop off when dropped. We smooshed a bit of soft foam into the spot you pry them open, and that's helped so far. The games that it includes are utterly unnecessary. They're lousy, frankly, and need literacy skills in a way that the rest of the camera does not. VTech brags in the manual about how educational they are-- but one is about a *worm* turning into a butterfly!
customer_reviews.author: SaganHaus

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful first camera for a child
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful first camera for a child. My three year old granddaughter loves taking 'cheese' just like her momma. It is easy for her to use now and she will grow into it and discover more functionality. I highly recommend this one! Pros: easy to use and travels well Cons: none I will update my review if this product fails to meet my expectations for durability As an online shopper I rely heavily on reviews left by others when trying to decide what to buy so I try to leave useful reviews for those products that I feel strongly about. Please let me know if you find my review helpful. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend this camera. I hot it for my 3yr old as I do photography as a hobby and he wanted to take pictures in the woods with me. The screen is tiny, it hard to see it or what you are taking a picture of, I did not notice a flash on it which in shaded woods is important, the games can't be disabled and in my opinion don't need to be on there. Also, one of the battery covers popped off the second time it was dropped. This cannot hold up to a child as children drop and throw things. Save your money, it's not worth it. Not even for a 3yr old.
customer_reviews.author: S.Swisher2360

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service, + defective camera = angry customer
customer_reviews.text: I just got off the phone with VTech support and was told they would not replace my defective camera. I'm trying to upload the pictures to my computer for the first time and via tech support discovered that I have a defective camera. I'm so frustrated because the pictures my daughter took are awesome and now I'll never be able to get them off for her.
customer_reviews.author: Kaia Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Bad bad bad
customer_reviews.text: The most efficient way to put money in the trash, it sounds fantastic, first time you turn on you are impressed but then try once more and you get system failure, the software gets suck all the time
customer_reviews.author: M Forsb

customer_reviews.title: Dead as a Doornail Right After Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo has taken about 200 pictures with this since Christmas. It suddenly stopped working during our drive home. Replaced batteries, still no go. Plugged it into the computer hoping the connection might kickstart it, still dead. Literally stopped dead after only a few days and 200 pictures.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: The camera was broken when my granddaughter’s mother opened the ...
customer_reviews.text: The camera was broken when my granddaughter’s mother opened the box. She called Amazon and even though she has a gift receipt they won’t exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Sue Gaudet

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it but the batteries do not stay in the camera. She's got it for her birthday Saturday and less then a week in the batteries pop out when she's using it. We missed the return window by a week. Very disappointed in this product. Not kid proof at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Check the device thoroughly!
customer_reviews.text: Like many kids, our child wanted this for Christmas. So my wife and I ordered the Kidizoom Camera and watch. The concept is outstanding but the quality is horrible! We put batteries in it and powered it on, just to check everything out before wrapping it. Glad we did it too because we discovered the rear LCD screen was defective. It has digital lines that remain on the screen, once powered on. What a let down!! I guess we should’ve performed some quality control as soon as the item was delivered. No it’s the night before Christmas and our son’s camera is jacked up!
customer_reviews.author: jimmy harrell jr.

customer_reviews.title: Baffled by Battery and Box
customer_reviews.text: I read the instructions which instruct to be sure the camera is off when you insert batteries. Whaaaaa ? ? ? I haven't seen or figured out how to KNOW if the camera is on or off before inserting batteries. Perhaps I shouldn't have pushed buttons while playing with it before reading the instructions. I bought another camera like this except blue in color and it was from another vendor. The blue camera came in a "real" camera box. This one arrived stuck into a brown cardboard container. Cameras are still sitting around awaiting batteries.
customer_reviews.author: C.C. Comment

customer_reviews.title: Durable Enough for Little Kids, Excellent Product, More Than a Camera
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son loves this camera!! For a while, he was obsessed with using mine and his mother's phone to take pictures, so I thought it would be a good idea to buy him a camera made for little kids like him. So I found this one and purchased it as the price is reasonable and it looked durable in photos. Turns out, this thing IS durable! It's been dropped quite a bit but it's a very tough toy. My son has a blast taking photos with it, and more recently he started playing some of the games on it. Whoever made this camera is a genius, as it's perfect for little kids and definitely keeps them entertained.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves taking pictures and I thought this would be perfect for her, oh how wrong I was. It’s extremely slow (going through settings and taking pictures), the buttons are hard to push and the quality of pictures are low. I love the idea behind having a camera for kids as young as 3 but they missed the mark. Kids are very smart and work well with technology in general and this camera is just a play toy and nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera for little ones, but should have an option to block the games
customer_reviews.text: First, I have to say, this is a great little camera for young ones. It is durable, the battery life is great, it has fun filters and frames that can be added to photos. My son loves taking photos of our family members, the dog, himself, the floor, you get the picture! The only complaint that I have, is that the games are so easily accessible. My husband and I are pretty limiting when it comes to screen time, and the game option is right on the main screen and there is no way to lock that option. Other than that, it really is a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Silvana

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second camera we bought. The first one was a different brand and returned. This camera is amazing. It's simple to use. My son loves it. He even asked to sleep with it the first night he had it. It takes a micro sd card, but also has tons of internal storage. It takes 4 AA batteries, which is great when we are at the cabin or roadtriping so we don't have to worry about charging it. They picture quality is nice for the price and fact that it's designed for kids. It's so durable. He understood how to use it immediately without having ever used a camera.
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: Why can't a camera by JUST a camera? Included video games are unnecessary and distracting
customer_reviews.text: Nice little camera. Unfortunately, they didn't stop there. Included are several very simplistic video games that the child can play on the camera screen. Sadly, this distracts from the joy of taking photos and noticing the world around you! We have enough screens in our life! Why can't a camera just be a camera?
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Uses upbatteries too quickly but very fun camera.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this camera for Christmas and she loves it. It does much more than just take pictures, it takes and allows you to edit videos, stop-motion, and fun filters. It even has games on it! My only complaint is that like other Vtech toys we have owned, it uses up batteries very quickly. In the first week after it was received, my children went through two sets of batteries. Of course, that is because they played with it for hours. VTech should consider making a rechargeable version.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not realizing that it's the older model. It's a great little camera for a tot, in fact one of my grandkids is still using his years later. The recipient of this one loves it just fine, but I did intend to buy the newer model which is even better (larger file size, anti-shake tec, larger view screen). This is totally great for little kids though. Just plan on helping your kid view the pictures on the computer or at least a tablet, because seeing the pictures in large size is more rewarding.
customer_reviews.author: England

customer_reviews.title: 4-Year Old Loved It !!
customer_reviews.text: 4-Year old could not put it down. She was totally fascinated by it. Unfortunately, her parents may have been just a teeny bit jealous that this was such a big hit. Especially when the expensive gifts Santa brought her were completely ignored. Since there are a couple of very simple little games on it, games that couldn't hold even a 4-YO's interest long, the parents used the games as an excuse to restrict her use of it. :) So, if buying this for a grandchild, do not point out the presence of the three little games!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ramone

customer_reviews.title: Depends on the kid it is for.
customer_reviews.text: It's not the simplest kid camera out there. My 3 year old is who it was for and he knows how to use it. My 1 year old throws it and the batteries go everywhere. It loses a star just because they should have put screws on the battery doors being a kid's camera. Other than that it's tough as nails and doesn't take unbearably bad pictures for a very young child. There is no flash, but I can see that being a safety thing so a child doesn't blind themselves looking straight into it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Problem with one of the cameras.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two cameras for my young grandsons. There was no problem getting the first one set up and ready to be used. My 4 yr old grandson was very excited to take pictures, but really didn't understand the operations to do the various activities. That will come. The second camera, however, had a battery cover that did not fit. It was constantly popping off and batteries falling out. Then it was extremely difficult to get the battery cover back on. I would have returned it, but was dealing with a 2 yr old that did not want to give it up. He wanted to take pictures like his brother. Anyway, expensive to have that sort of problem.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: She has yet to break it, we've had it for a couple months now. She has filled it up multiple times, the only thing that was a little annoying is that it can only take up to a certain amount for the memory chip, so I bought the biggest size I could find and it wasn't working in the camera, so I read the instructions and realized it can only take a certain size. Other than that it has been awesome, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Great first camera - lots of photo tools, videos, and games!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these - they can take pictures whenever they want (we buy large memory cards to go with it), make videos, record sounds, make stop motion movies, add borders and other special effects to photos, and play games. It's a great first camera. My daughter still uses hers several years later - we purchased when she was 4 or 5 years and she still uses at 8. Very durable so we don't have to worry about dropping it or opening/deleting apps on the ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well while it lasts but stops right after warranty ends
customer_reviews.text: The camera is sturdy. It worked well while it lasted. My daughter had fun with both that photo features and the games. But it does not last as many others have noted. I got about 5 months out of it. It no longer powers on. It hasn’t been subject to rough use or extreme conditions but still stopped working for no apparent reasons. I would expect this to last a lot longer. For this reason I don’t recommend this product. I would have rated this 4 or 5 stars after a week but what count in the end that it didn’t last and I have to buy something else in less than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice kid camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice little camera for a kid. Bought this for my 4yo as a Christmas gift. It has photo, video and game functions but so far he’s only taken pictures. I gave it 4 stars because it does not come with batteries, SD card or a specific usb cable. I can see the no batteries and SD card but no specific cable to plug it into the computer? For $30 you would think you wouldn’t have to go back online and find the cable to purchase. Camera takes and saves pictures without a memory card so it does have at least a little internal memory.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Overall decent camera.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the is a great option for kids that love pictures but aren't up to the real deal yet. The picture quality is adequate for its intended audience, but it's pails in comparison to and camera phone since 2007. The only real issue we have has with it is it takes 4 AA batteries and the battery doors do not stay on very well. Any time the camera is dropped, the battery doors fly off and have to be replaced. I doubt it makes it very long until those doors are lost.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 5 year old. So far so good for durability. He loves the games, he loves the ability to play with editing photos. One draw back, you have to hold it until the shutter noise is done, otherwise, it blurs the photo--that is creating a learning curve. The cord to transfer the photos from the camera to a computer is not included, we didn't realize that when making the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: What a Great First Camera!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera for our daughters (we bought two, one for each). It is a great camera, easy for your child to figure out how to use it. It also has games on it, adjustable volume too! It was great for several flights and layover at the airports. They even played with it on the way to the airport and took some photos on the plane. They absolutely LOVE this camera.
customer_reviews.author: J  Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: We got a different camera for my toddlers bday but it never worked. We had trouble getting a replacement so we eventually gave up and just bought this one. It’s $10 more but it works and does exactly what we expected it to do. It’s a cheap camera so the pic quality isn’t great, but we expected that. It’s more about the joy of picture taking than the actual pics for our kid.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi M

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my niece after my daughter got one for Christmas. Whenever she came over she would go straight for the camera and take about 200 pictures, so it was a no brainer what to get her for her birthday. My daughter is 2 and my niece is 4, so it’s a nice toy for different ages. It’s durable, been dropped many times, the batteries fall out sometimes, but it always turns back on. They love taking pictures with a “real” camera and playing the games on it. Make sure you learn how to delete all the pictures at once, it will save you some time ;)
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Low quality pics and not fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Tiny screen and low quality pics, games are not fun, I would suggest to use a starter phone or tablet, who needs a "real" camera nowadays anyway, everything is geared toward better picture quality with a phone camera, wish I could have returned it but the packaging was destroyed when opened up for Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: P. Coons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for preschoolers!
customer_reviews.text: This makes such a great gift! My 5.5 year old son received it for Christmas and loves it. It is very kid friendly and easy to use- takes picture, videos, and has a few games. We haven’t tried printing the photos yet, but will do that soon. The photo quality is so-so, but definitely good enough for a kid camera! My 4 year old son loves it too and can easily navigate it. Definitely a must-add to your kiddo’s wishlist!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game time is a problem
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for her 4th birthday. She loves it. It’s easy for her to use and the frames and special effects are fun. As most children do, she wants to play the games. This is fine, but she never completes a level in any of the games. It frustrates her. They give you almost no time to complete each level. Even when I play for her, I’m down to 9-12 seconds before I complete the first level. This is not enough time for a 4 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Poor design and one good fall will break the batter ...
customer_reviews.text: Something broke and we called customer service and they would not replace the part. However they had the part listed on the replacement part website. Poor design and one good fall will break the batter door off. Very disappointed in this product and the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product. Would definitely recommend for 5yr and 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 6yr old is loving it! This is a great camera and it has numerous games that both the 5 and 6yr old are playing it all the time! It have some educational games and it's very durable. It has been dropped numerous times and still works just fine. The battery consumption is great. I haven't changed the batter's since they opened it and it has been almost 3 months. The girls are using it every other day and they are loving it!!! A great gift!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fun and durable
customer_reviews.text: Cute and the kids (ages 3-5) love it. I had to write a review after this camera survived being thrown in the bathtub! It has held up after being thrown around for 5 months. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tabbylee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: my sons loves taking pictures with our phones so we got him this for christmas, and he loves his own camera! you can take pics and videos, and there are even a few easy games on there too. decent storage, and you have to option to add a micro sd card. we havent tried getting the pictures off the camera yet so can't comment on the quality but basically its like an early 90's camera phone. comes with a handy wrist/carry strap
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R. Parker

customer_reviews.title: I put it on the same level as what digital camera results looked like when they first came out
customer_reviews.text: I read a ton of reviews before purchasing this product, and I was very excited to gift it to my four-year-old on Christmas. The picture quality is eh, but I expected it. I put it on the same level as what digital camera results looked like when they first came out. It is fairly easy to figure out. I reduced the stars because it is very very easy to get the batteries out. If the camera is dropped the sides of the camera fly off and the batteries go everywhere. I am not talking thrown down, just dropped.. as to be expected with a kid-friendly​ camera. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: My son loves taking pictures with our cell phones so we thought this would be a good xmas gift for him but I'm still on the fence. He loved it at first but after a while grew bored/does not like that the quality is not the same as our phones (haha). Then he discovered the games on it and has stopped using it for a camera.... he's 3, never played games/video games so I'm nervous we've created a bad habit we didn't ever want him to have. We have showed him the funny frames and tricks on the camera mode in hopes that will recapture his attention but no luck so far.
customer_reviews.author: akaMomTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for the Young Beginner
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this is the best camera for littles to learn on. We have 3 of them. A few games make it fun. The pictures aren't super quality but we don't care while they are learning. Easy to navigate and super easy to take pictures. Also, incredibly durable. Out boys throw them when they are mad and I accidentally threw one down a flight of stairs. It tumbled down the last steps, hit the wall, and landed on carpet. Batteries popped out but it still works as it always has. Would like a little cheaper due to pic quality but I really appreciate the durability, in my mind still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Boone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my 6 year old nephew for Christmas. I made the mistake of giving it to him first. He practically ignored his other gifts. He would open a gift and then go back to playing with the camera. This was his first camera, it is very easy to use & he was snapping pictures right away. It also comes with video games, need I say more? Packaging was frustration free as advertised which is a welcome change. Highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute camera for a little kid
customer_reviews.text: My 2-yo daughter got this for Christmas and LOVES it! She takes pictures of EVERYTHING. They’re not the greatest quality, but a lot of that is because she doesn’t hold the camera as still as she should. There is a bit of a delay between pushing the button and when it actually takes the picture. Closing this gap and adding an image stabilizer would help with the quality of the pictures a kid would take. These features are likely to raise the price a bit, though. Overall, this is a cute little camera. My 2-yo has figured out how to navigate the features just fine and we enjoy seeing the world from her perspective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extra costs for cable and card, plus not such a great camera...returned...
customer_reviews.text: We returned this item for the following reasons: 1. no flash 2. no cable 3. batteries were not included 4. no memory card (tho stated in description) 5. games included were very simple While the cameras weight and protective housing were a plus, the buttons, enlargement features etc. were a deterrent to any real enjoyment. We chose instead to familiarize our preschooler with the features of a real camera, and features of our smartphone camera. In time with patience and understanding, photo taking will be fun for this little one.
customer_reviews.author: An Educated Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: We got this camera for my 3 year old for Christmas. It took him a little while to get use to taking pictures with it, because of the location of the shutter button and zoom buttons, but by now he's a pro. He uses more for the games, than pictures. He has a great time playing with this, and I will say the picture quality isn't the best, but this is a kiddie camera, so I'm not surprised. Overall this is a fun way to get kids into photography, and a great way to keep them from taking a ton of photos with your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Greatest Kids' Gift Ever
customer_reviews.text: Greatest gift ever for my three year old granddaughter! It is designed so well. When she drops it, as 3 yo do, it is designed so it isn't damaged, the card allows her to take hundreds of pictures (important since a 3 yo tends to let the lens move when taking a photo. Her dad down loads the card on his computer and saves her best ones for a slide show or prints. (Her favorite game is to take photos of unsuspecting victims--frequently of her mom's rear or bending over--then she squeals with delight and runs.) It is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: pshell

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fun and quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased. I bought one for one of my grandsons last year and discovered it was awesome. I bought another one this year for another grandson. This is quality! It is easy enough for a 3 year old to use. It does not mind being dropped. It not only takes great pictures and videos, it has a few little video games on it and photo editing frames and fun stamps they can use to decorate their photos. It is truly amazing and the one I bought last year is still working after a year of use...and he still loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Bob

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't work - didn't charge!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grand-daughters birthday. I put it in the gift bag and my daughter took it home with all the other gifts. She said that the camera looked like it was used and they tried to charge it for 2 days. They finally just threw it away as it wouldn't work. I would have returned it to the seller if I had been told by them that it didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 3 1/2 year old for Christmas. She loves taking pictures! She is absolutely going to love this. It’s super cute, seems sturdy. The pictures aren’t top quality, but actually better than I expected. The only problem I can foresee is the controls for the game, edit and other features may take a little time for her to master.
customer_reviews.author: facey21

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your kid from using your phone for photos
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't so much say that I love it, but my kid does. He took so many pictures the first morning that I had to delete the memory. I don't really care for the games on it, if I wanted my kid to have access to games I would buy him a device specifically for that. But he likes walking around taking pictures, and it keeps him from snapping 100 photos with my iPhone in 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Ledoux2013

customer_reviews.title: IT's just OK.....
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are not good at all. Very grainy. However, my 3 year old grandson does like the product. We go hiking quite a bit and he hangs it around his neck to take pictures of whatever he sees along the way. The games are a waste really. He doesn't use those at all so that actually could be eliminated to focus more on taking pictures instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Launiu

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality photos
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for five year twins. They love it and can see on the camera what picture they took, but when it comes to downloading on computer the pictures are no good. The quality does not transfer to the computer and not an option we use anymore. Fun camera to play with for kids, but you won’t get anything you can keep.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia, AZ

customer_reviews.title: Product worked great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece who will be 5 in February after she spent all of Thanksgiving taking pictures with her pretend camera. It was very easy to install the batteries which was the only thing I needed to do in order to take pictures. The camera itself has enough memory for about 230 pictures. She ran through that in less than 3 hours. You can add a memory card, which we did. By the end of the day, she had taken over 600 pictures. The quality seems fine for a child's camera. It's hard to tell if any blurriness was the fault of the camera or the young operator. Overall, this aunt won Christmas with this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for Toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler got this for her third birthday and she loves taking pictures with it! The camera is only 2 megapixels so it won't take amazing quality pictures, but that's obviously fine for small kids. There are even 4 little minigames on this camera and a surprising amount of filters you can add to your pictures! The only downside is that you have to delete singular pictures or hook it up to your computer and move the pictures when the memory is full.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lohrum

customer_reviews.title: 10 star product
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 10 stars I would. I am blown away by how great this product is. It has full color games on it with levels, picture taking with a view screen, and videos. This is GREAT quality. Rubber outside makes it extremely durable. I would recommend this I everyone. My 5 year old loved it for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers. They'll love it.
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is blurry and not great at all when doing like portrait photos. Kind of like flip phone photo quality lol... But doing landscape photos you can get a decent one. Here's a picture my son took of me. The color is limited. It turned more like black and white. I did some editing on picmonkey.com to bring more color to it...
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: A big hit for 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: My great, great niece picked this out for her 5th birthday. Her face lit up like a Christmas tree when she opened it. She was out of memory the first day from taking so many pictures. Her aunt is a photography buff so they are enjoying some quality bonding time. It's sturdy and has lots of cute options. A must have.
customer_reviews.author: VickieV

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: It should come with an sd card and batteries. Even if you bring the price up a little that would still be worth it because it arrived and was useless until we went out and bought batteries. Then after a couple of days had to go out again and get an SD card too because the internal memory storage amount isn’t great.
customer_reviews.author: Jordana McDowell

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is always wanting to take photos with my expensive camera, so I thought this was a good buy. And I was right, she loves it! She is 4 and can work it easily and get creative, we really love it! It has games, options to take videos, as well as editing photos to add a creative flair.
customer_reviews.author: Senerio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera - the kids just love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I bought 2. My 4 year old grand niece loves hers and takes really nice pictures. She loves the games too. My 2 year old grand nephew really really likes his. He plays with it virtually every day. Not so great at taking pictures but does capture some interesting stuff. He turns it on and off by himself and is learning how to navigate the menus. Great product, really durable and fun!!
customer_reviews.author: RbbBach

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old nephew loves it. He's begun taking pictures with his mom's iPhone, but of course it filled up her phone way too fast and there was always the fear he would drop it. He loves having his own camera and his mom loves getting to keep her iPhone. The games are a bit silly, and the resolution is an early digitial camera level, but when the kid's pictures consist mostly of cat ears, the floor, and a blur which was once their baby brother, it's not really a bad thing to be able to fit thousands of pictures on one medium sized memory card!
customer_reviews.author: Nikko

customer_reviews.title: Your child can actually take their own pictures
customer_reviews.text: The Camera is designed for easy operation for you little one, and they can actually take their own pictures. The quality is not the best, but hey, it is mostly a toy but the quality is OK. I like that it turns itself off when my little one forgets and just puts it down. Nice gift for a child, my four year old loves hers.
customer_reviews.author: Summerrat

customer_reviews.title: Best kids camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing kids camera, especially for the price. My 7 year old breaks everything, she's had this for about 3 years and it's still going, even after a play session in the bath tub. No it isn't water proof, but I let it dry out and it actually came back to life. Of course my daughter lost it on a trip recently, but when I replaced it I got the exact same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon Aston

customer_reviews.title: Not able to use it for what we wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera with the intention of my kids being able to take pictures and be creative. Instead it is a constant battle over the ridiculous games on the camera. My kids (ages 4 and 2) get sucked into playing the games. The games are designed to where it is difficult for them to exit the game once they open it. I want to return these cameras and get something that is intended as a camera NOT a game.
customer_reviews.author: k.allen

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cameras.  Very adicting to the kiddos though!
customer_reviews.text: It has been amazing how the 3 year old twins have figured out how to use these things. They can take pictures, videos, and play the games. I am pretty impressed. There are quite a few buttons that I thought were going to be pretty problematic but they have sorted it out pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nieling

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift for my 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was always pretending to take pictures so when I came across this I had to have it for her! She loves it! The camera itself is very durable! She has dropped the camera several times and there are no marks on it what so ever! Internal storage is limited so I recommend picking up memory card, which you can find pretty inexpensively. She loves to show off all of her photos!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Would not work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: We were really excited to get this for my son's 5-year birthday but we couldn't even get it to work straight out of the box.. we tried many things and it was such a horrible disappointment we are going to send it back it's such a shame because he was very upset and you would expect better from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Anon

customer_reviews.title: Poor photo quality; might be more suitable for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this; I bought one for my son and one for his friend. However, I wasn't very satisfied with the purchase. I think the photo quality is way too low (I didn't expect a camera which is meant to be a toy to produce great photos, but the images are too blurry). I think this is more appropriate for very young children (maybe 2-3.5) who are curious about using an electronic device. For older kids who are into taking real photos, I think an entry-level basic digital camera will be a better investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a kids first camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for a kid! Got this for my son for Christmas- he is 5, and absolutely loves it. The controls and settings are easy to access and understand, and it has already survived a few falls. There are fun settings to manipulate pictures, as well as three games. The only downside is that the picture quality is not amazing; that said, for a little kid, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Kids favorite
customer_reviews.text: Kids love shooting pics & videos with this easy to use camera. It also has some fun games, keeps them occupied for a long time! I've purchased 5 of these already & given to 5 different children & they all love it! Also great quality & can withstand rough and tumble play (to some extent)
customer_reviews.author: ED H

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to use,great pics, lots of fun features
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my eight year old granddaughter and she loves it.It's simple to use and has many features to grow with age level. Seems very sturdy and a great deal for the price. I would recommend this product for even older kids. The pictures and videos come out clear and can be uploaded to your computer. I reviewed lots of cameras costing more but comments showed they weren't as sturdy or reliable. This was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: kay pope

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not at all pleased that this camera has games on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 y/o loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 y/o and she didn’t put it down for the whole weekend. I really wish it didn’t have the game option because she always finds them on the menu and doesn’t know how to play or navigate the prompts... so then I end up getting asked for help, which is opposite of why I got this toy! Lol. She loves taking pictures but hasn’t quite figured out the selfie mode or the stickers/stamps. She’ll grow into it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Laine Hegness

customer_reviews.title: Best toy ever
customer_reviews.text: Our almost 3 year old is totally obsessed with this. Easy to use and understand. You can actually save the pictures if you want. Expanded memory. It’s like a crazy good deal and I can see her keeping this toy around for several years bc it actually works. It’s not like amazing quality photos/videos but they are adorable and vintage feeling. Super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Aubree Harris

customer_reviews.title: Cable not included, fickle with memory card.
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty disappointed in this camera. We can’t find a cable that will get the pictures off the camera, and the SD card we ordered won’t format in the camera. My sweet three year old got this for his birthday and basically only got to use it for his birthday trip to the zoo. I’m still messing with it to try and get his photos off so he can take more, but this is just way too much effort for a kids camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: More like gameboy
customer_reviews.text: All they want to do is play the video games on it. Ruined the idea of getting my daughter a camera. Mote like a gameboy. I will say the camera and video are good though
customer_reviews.author: Oceangirl

customer_reviews.title: Only a three month warranty—buyer beware if any issues arise.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 5 months of use. The buttons, specifically the “ok” button would no longer work. After reaching out to V-Tech they sent along the warranty policy which only covers a 3 month warranty from the date of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel V.

customer_reviews.title: We are not happy with it this time around
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this camera for our 2.5 yo. She loves playing with her sister's camera (older version of this camera), so we decided to buy her one of her own. We are not happy with it this time around. The battery compartments are extremely easy for a child to open, resulting in lost batteries and an almost broken camera. The older version has battery compartments that are difficult for a child to open. I wish they had not changed the way it was designed, because right now my 2.5yo is too little to play with it (big sister was the same age when she got hers).
customer_reviews.author: E.K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camera for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute camera! Bout this for my 5 year old for Christmas and he loves it! Said it was his favorite gift and it wasn’t even on his list. It works great and the pictures are perfect quality for a 5 year old. He loves the games and all of the extra features. I do recommend buying an extra memory card so they don’t run out of memory quickly. I bought my 7 year old daughter the deluxe version of this and she loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Kay0115

customer_reviews.title: Fun and creative toy for a kid
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 year old loves this camera. I've been really impressed with the animation features that it offers. It's been fun to see our daughter get creative and make little animated videos with that. It's a cute camera, and she figured out how to use all of the features pretty easily on her own!
customer_reviews.author: S. Westhof

customer_reviews.title: Great value and lots of fun for broad age range
customer_reviews.text: My son has had endless fun with this camera, he hasn’t put it down since he got it. It has all kinds of games, tricks and entertaining features that both of my children have thoroughly enjoyed. It is sturdy/ durable and good for a very wide age range. My youngest son is 7, I was afraid it would be a little young for him but was pleasantly surprised. Great price for what it is. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: UKCAT

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a Christmas gift for my 4 year old. He loves it. As other people stated, the digital quality is not the best but for the price it's a really great camera. We have lots of pictures of the floor, my dogs behind and half our faces and they are very easy to delete. I never even read the directions.
customer_reviews.author: KCauley

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 1/2 year old cousin for Christmas. I opened it when it came in to make sure it worked and it did. I was really impressed with it and mg cousin loved it and wouldn't put it down. Now, she is a little young to fully understand how to use it, but it really is easy to use. It seems pretty durable too.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Great first camera
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our 2 1/2 year old granddaughter. She loves it and took loads of pictures right away. There are other options that we haven't introduced her to yet, like the video, but she really enjoyed herself, even though she had never really seen a camera before. We plan on printing out the photos to make a book and expect that she will be even more impressed. It's definitely a hit and will grow with her for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: So-so picture quality, but a tough little camera
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality isn't great, and it really needs bright daylight to take decent photos, but my son (almost four years old) doesn't care. He LOVES taking pictures with it, and best of all he's dropped it many times and it still works perfectly. One warning: I downloaded the software from the web site and still couldn't get the camera to connect to my computer. Eventually I figured out that the included cable was the problem. I used another mini-USB cable I had lying around, and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. My toddler has already spiked it a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. My toddler has already spiked it a couple times and it survived unscathed. Price is hard to beat. The two eye holes are great! She instinctively knew how to use it because of that. This keeps our daughter away from our cameras/phones so it is well worth it. The games are kinda funky. It seems like VTech was trying to put a bit too much into the camera. However they do seem to work and my daughter plays with them and seems to enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Okay I was very excited about this product, thann it came, it has some games, what i didnt think was a problem, but it was. Many games, very distracting, kids focused mostly on that, and we were looking for a camera not a video game. We returned with 10 min of use. Ps needs AA batteries, 4 of them, now make the math lol
customer_reviews.author: Falastin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my nephew for his third birthday. I wasn’t sure if it would hold his attention. He loves his camera and runs around the house taking pictures of everyone. He isn’t a great shot but he will improve. He is too young for the games. I like that as he gets older her will learn more about the camera and it’s features.
customer_reviews.author: aqwati15

customer_reviews.title: Cool beginner camera
customer_reviews.text: My kids love the camera. It’s perfect for ages 4-6. It is durable, has lots of fun editing features, filters, and even games. The picture quality is mediocre, and battery life could be better. Has a removable card so the photos can be transferred.
customer_reviews.author: Damian K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, good picture quality...needs better battery option.
customer_reviews.text: Cute and easy to use. Found it to be affordable and my 4 year old picked up on it quickly. It’s cute to see the world from her perspective. Not sure I would call it a complaints but I wish that 1. It didn’t take batteries and had a charging option and 2. It didn’t come with games that my daughter wants to play and therefore wastes said batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for a kid!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this for her 5th birthday and it definitely met expectations. She loves the games and the different settings it has for adding graphics to photos. It can take videos. The quality of the pictures is sufficient for a 5 year old. The camera shuts off by itself after being idol which helps save the battery. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES having her own camera to take pictures with. Great picture quality (pleasantly surprised) and has a hefty amount of storage (holds 300+ photos before needing to be cleared). My only complaint is that there are games on the camera; my daughter is 4 so we've been avoiding electronics but she immediately hopped onto the game. There doesn't seem to be a way to remove that option. The camera has rubber on the sides, great grip, easy to use/understand buttons and toggle.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves it, has games, picture frames, video and pictures, Zooms and it super easy to use. The quality of the pictures is exactly what you expect for a kids camera. I put in a SD with lots of memory. Looking at the pictures the kids take is the best out of all of it.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love these cameras I bought them. Fun right from the start. Not incredibly good quality pictures but the fun of taking the pics and movies and playing them back right away had them giggling for hours. The kids are 5 and 7.
customer_reviews.author: BringData

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old granddaughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sturdy little camera. Multiple functions but not too difficult to teach the children. Now my son and his daughter both take their cameras on nature hikes. She's quickly learning to be a good little photographer! Packaged well and shipped quickly. I highly recommend this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, does NOT come with USB cord
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for a child to use and play with. I quickly looked at the pictures that show the camera with a USB cord but didn't read the details close enough stating that the USB cord is not included...why wouldn't this be included?
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: For a kid's camera, there are some pretty awesome features.
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is decent enough given that a 5 year old is using it. Best quality when there is good lighting. No flash. But again, a small child is using it and she really doesn't mind. I put in Energizer batteries over three weeks ago and the camera is still running strong. My child uses it almost every day and even plays games on it, if that gives you an idea of the battery life. She also figured out how to use everything on it just by exploring and pushing buttons. I didn't even have to go over the instructions with her.
customer_reviews.author: glodotz

customer_reviews.title: Seller needs to make sure product works
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in the last two purchases I made from amazon. Both defective products. The camera looked new out of the box but when put new batteries in, would not even turn on. Sending back for an exchange. Hopefully I can update my review with a positive. Looks great and my daughter who just turned 5 is really interested in having this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Literally the cutest thing. Got this for my 4 year old for Christmas. She loves it. She can take pictures, use funny filters, record videos and even play games. I had to help her maybe a few times to navigate through it but she finally has it down. You can even download the photos she took and put it on the computer. So far so we dropped it pretty bad once, the batteries fell out but for so far it’s still in really good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failure during the Coronavirus
customer_reviews.text: Failure. It lasted 4 months. And the warranty is for 3 moths. When we contacted them, they told us we were just out of warranty. A camera for a 6 year old would have been a nice relief. During a national pandemic, it's good to see companies helping out, even in small ways. This is not one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Camera quality poor, has built in games...why
customer_reviews.text: Its sturdy, kinda big for a toddler. The image quality has a lot to be desired. Also it has built in games, please be aware of this if you are worried about screen time. I didnt think to look for games because I was just looking for a camera.
customer_reviews.author: Hamuel Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful choice of camera for a 2-6 year old.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera for my 4 year old who wanted a camera. It's durable, cheap, and easy for him to learn. I was a little concerned about the games on the camera because I don't like him playing games all day. I was relieved to see there were only 4 and they are pretty lame. He burnt out on them pretty quickly and loves it to take pictures. Picture quality isn't good obviously but he doesn't notice.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hughey

product_meta.title: VTech KidiZoom Camera Pix, Pink (Frustration Free Packaging)
product_meta.description: Color:Pink| Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingTake real digital photographs with the durable Kidizoom Camera Pix by VTech. This kid-friendly camera includes all the tools budding photographers want to use. Turn the camera to take a picture of yourself and it will automatically detect faces for a perfect selfie! Take photos in a variety of exciting templates to create your own photo collages. Explore your creativity by using static and animated photo effects to enhance your pictures. The Camera Pix also has a video recorder, voice recorder, 4 built-in games and more that add to the fun. Explore your creativity! Requires 4 AA batteries (not included). Intended for ages 3 to 8 years.
feature_bullets: Take real digital photographs with the durable Kidizoom camera Pix by VTech; real 2.0 Mega pixels camera; 4x digital zoom; frustration free packaging means it comes easier to open in a plain brown box
The kid-friendly Kidizoom camera Pix includes all the tools that budding photographers want in a digital camera; durable design protects from drops and tumbles
Selfie mode Detects your face and automatically takes the perfect picture; four built-in games add to the fun; includes a video recorder and Voice recorder for more Creative ways to play

Fun photo collage templates in addition to static and animated photo effects enhance your pictures; more than 35 fun photo effects and 4 Creative apps; connect to your computer to download all of your creations (micro USB cable sold separately)
Built-in memory and micro SD card slot for memory expansion (micro SD card sold separately); requires 4 AA batteries (not included); intended for ages 3 to 8 years

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,403 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
